trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Norfolk
There was one other sighting in Norfolk on or around September 28th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw object motionless in sky from plane and photographed.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was flying in a small plane. Saw object to left side. Thought it was another plane or blimp. Realised it was motionless and not quite a blimp shape. Quickly photographed with cellphone. I will answer questions from Mufon investigators.
